## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing
      functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Security improvement
- [ ] Performance optimization
- [ ] Code refactoring
- [ ] Infrastructure/deployment change

## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published
- [ ] Pre-commit hooks pass
- [ ] Kubernetes manifests are valid
- [ ] Helm chart renders correctly

## Security Checklist

- [ ] No secrets or sensitive data in code
- [ ] Environment variables used for configuration
- [ ] Kubernetes secrets properly configured
- [ ] Redis authentication/ACL properly configured
- [ ] Network policies reviewed
- [ ] Pod security standards compliance verified
- [ ] TLS configuration reviewed (if applicable)

## Infrastructure/Kubernetes Specific

- [ ] Resource limits appropriate
- [ ] Health probes configured correctly
- [ ] Labels and annotations correct
- [ ] Service account permissions minimal
- [ ] ConfigMaps/Secrets properly referenced
- [ ] PVC storage requirements addressed
